(0.0601377331744074, 0.6447948960408444, 0.9461379573597475, 0.7055652683558666)
Resistance is directly proportional to length, indirectly proportional to area

(0.0601377331744074, 0.5840245237258221, 0.9461379573597475, 0.6447948960408444)

(0.0601377331744074, 0.4017134067807555, 0.9461379573597475, 0.46248377909577776)
